data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 23327, Version Hash: 155d861ee032dc13e06b22fad3c5b5ab40e190c5
data.actual_result: You can still view and reconnect to the voice channel as long as you dont press the disconnect button
data.expected_result: You should be removed from the private voice channel after leaving and should not be able to view it
data.short_description: Being able to rejoin private voice channels you've been instant invited to but cannot view normally
data.steps_to_repro: - Get an instant invite link to a voice channel you cannot view - Join the channel - leave the channel by going directly to another voice channel (I tested it by going to a different server) - Rejoin the previous private voice channel that you can still see
